pair.name: TV Name
pair.ip_hint: Is the Unique Serial Number correct but the IP address not? Change it now or after completing the addition in the device settings.
pair.usn_hint: Enter Unique Serial Number for automatic IP-Refresh.
pair.mac_hint: Enter MAC address for Wake On LAN. Can be found in the TV settings.
pair.help: Make sure your TV is switched ON and connected to the Internet. To improve stability, give the TV a static IP address (selected IP address must not be used by another device!)
pair.maunalhint: Hint: Homey will not automatically search for a new IP address for the TV unless you enter the Unique Serial Number manually.

device.legacy: Please remove the TV from Homey and add it again, as it is connected via an outdated driver version.
